org.jpc.salt

Interface TermContentHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PrologContentHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedPrologEngineWriter, ChangeVariableNameAdapter, DefaultTermContentHandler, JpcTermWriter, PrologEngineWriter, PrologFileWriter, PrologStreamWriter, PrologWriter, ReplaceVariableAdapter, TermAdapter, TermWriter

    public interface TermContentHandler
    The interface of objects interested in listening to the description of logic terms as a stream of events
    Author:
    sergioc
